short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic tools for RideWithGPS for RUSA routes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basic tools for http://ridewithgps.com to view and edit routes for https://rusa.org/

* Check time limit using official RUSA calculator
* Check route integrity using Google Maps bicycling directions
* Alternate start: rotate a route to start at an intermediate control
* Automatically annotate cues with Control numbers and time limits
* Hotkeys for common tasks
